name: MarwadiMatrimony - The No. 1 choice of Marwadis
description: The exciting new and official android App for MarwadiMatrimony is finally here!  MarwadiMatrimony is a part of and is pioneered by BharatMatrimony  the worlds largest and most trusted matrimony portal. Our global network has helped thousands of brides and grooms from Rajasthan find their perfect life partner.  We are featured in the Limca Book of World Records for highest number of documented marriages online.  How different is the App from the website? No different, except that you can carry your partner search with you on your phone. And a whole range of exciting features that will make you fall in love with our App before you fall in love with your perfect match.  Take a look at what makes us stand apart from the rest of the Marwadi matchmaking App crowd.   Registration of your profile can be done within the App.  Search, filter, view, and shortlist Marwadi brides/grooms using different search options.  Search profiles by Matri ID.  View photos and phone numbers of members you are interested in.  Get real-time notifications and stay connected with prospects anytime, anywhere.  Chat, send interests, and personal messages and get to know your matches better.  GPS-enabled City Search feature lets you find matches closer to your location.  Your privacy is a top priority for us at all times, so feel safe. Use our 100% secure app to find your best match and enjoy a happy Shaadi.  To top it all, our App doesnt take up a lot of space on your phone. The MarwadiMatrimony App is smart and light!  Over the years we have helped Marwadi members find matches from across different Marwadi-speaking communities such Agarwal, Jain - Oswal, Maheshwari, Brahmin - Gaur, Rajput, Rajastani, Jat, Baniya, Khandayat, and Brahmin  Khandelwal.  Looking to search for a bride/groom based on Religion? We have matches from all religions including Hindu, Jain, Jain Shwetambar, Jain Digambar, Muslim, Muslim Sunni, Muslim Shia, Christian, Christian Catholic, and Christian Protestant.  Not just that, we have profiles from across the world with top searches from India, United States of America, United Arab Emirates, Australia, Nepal, Canada, United Kingdom, Saudi Arabia, Singapore, and Oman.  Our top registrations come from States namely Rajasthan, Maharashtra, Gujarat, West Bengal, Karnataka, Delhi, Andhra Pradesh, Orissa, Madhya Pradesh, and Tamil Nadu and from cities namely Mumbai, Jaipur, Ahmedabad, Pune, Kolkata, Jodhpur, Bangalore, Delhi, Surat, and Chennai.  There are also profiles from different professions/occupations such as Manager, Executive, Software Professional, Business Analyst, CXO / President, Director, Chairman, Student, Marketing Professional, Officer, Supervisors, and Accounts/Finance Professional.  With such a large database of profiles and advanced search criteria, you are sure to find the most perfect life partner.  BharatMatrimony has been conferred with numerous national and international awards for its pioneering spirit, vision, and continuous growth through its path-breaking and innovative excellence. Some of such accolades include:   One of the 100 Most Innovative Companies Globally as recognized by Red Herring  Most Trusted Online Matrimony award by The Brand Trust Report  NDTV-Hindu Lifestyle Award for the Best Community Matrimony Website  Ranked twice in Top 50 Fastest Growing Tech Companies in India by Deloitte  The Most Visited Matrimony Portal in the World by Comscore  Download today for FREE and discover your life partner on the go!
